entry.title: Mailing List Future
entry.summary:
It appears you've provided an incomplete email context with your instructions. The snippet presented seems to be part of a conversation between two programmers regarding organizational logistics, but without further content, I cannot provide a summary according to your specified rules.
To create an accurate blog post or summary, I would need the full body of the email that contains the key points of discussion, decisions made, technical details, or any other pertinent information that should be included in the summary. If you can provide the complete email or additional parts of the conversation, I will be able to assist you better and craft a summary that adheres to your guidelines.
